Create a folder (directory) on the computer.
In the created folder, put all the application files:
	main.cpp, MemoryAllocator.cpp, MemoryAllocator.h, MemoryAllocator.h.
	And also files allocator1.txt, allocator2.txt
	Which were specified in your job, the file RAR in the application Lab3Data.zip
	in this file there are 2 text documents which you will give to the application for execution. 
	The mtx files are fed into the input and files 111 for comparison with 
	what the terminal displays after execution 
	(they can be prevented from being added to the application program folder).

In the terminale of Linux, you need in the folder with the file program MemoryAllocator

Enter Command: make
After this, the startup file must be created in the folder: memory_allocator


in the folder with the program
Enter Command: ./memory_allocator allocator1.txt
The terminal should output the values corresponding to your file 
allocator1.txt.out: 

#5
#2
 10000 20000 30000 40000
#1 1
 T 3
#2
 20000 30000 40000
#0 1
 T 4
#2
 10000 20000 30000 40000
#1 5
 F 4
#2
 10000 20000 30000 40000
#1 1
 T 3
#1 2
 T 1
#0 6
 F 1
#0 7
 F 1
#0 1
 T 2
#0 1
 T 3
#0 1
 T 4
#2
 10000 20000 30000 40000
#0 1
 F 4
#0 1
 F 4
#0 1
 F 4
#1 6
 F 4
#2
 10000 20000 30000 40000

Next 
Enter Command: ./memory_allocator allocator2.txt
he terminal should output the values corresponding to your file 
allocator2.txt.out:

#100
#2
 10000 20000 30000 40000 50000 60000 70000 80000 90000 a0000 b0000 c0000 d0000 e0000 f0000 100000 110000 120000 130000 140000 150000 160000 170000 180000 190000 1a0000 1b0000 1c0000 1d0000 1e0000 1f0000 200000 210000 220000 230000 240000 250000 260000 270000 280000 290000 2a0000 2b0000 2c0000 2d0000 2e0000 2f0000 300000 310000 320000 330000 340000 350000 360000 370000 380000 390000 3a0000 3b0000 3c0000 3d0000 3e0000 3f0000 400000 410000 420000 430000 440000 450000 460000 470000 480000 490000 4a0000 4b0000 4c0000 4d0000 4e0000 4f0000 500000 510000 520000 530000 540000 550000 560000 570000 580000 590000 5a0000 5b0000 5c0000 5d0000 5e0000 5f0000 600000 610000 620000 630000 640000 650000 660000 670000 680000 690000 6a0000 6b0000 6c0000 6d0000 6e0000 6f0000 700000 710000 720000 730000 740000 750000 760000 770000 780000 790000 7a0000 7b0000 7c0000 7d0000 7e0000 7f0000 800000 810000 820000 830000 840000 850000 860000 870000 880000 890000 8a0000 8b0000 8c0000 8d0000 8e0000 8f0000 900000 910000 920000 930000 940000 950000 960000 970000 980000 990000 9a0000 9b0000 9c0000 9d0000 9e0000 9f0000 a00000 a10000 a20000 a30000 a40000 a50000 a60000 a70000 a80000 a90000 aa0000 ab0000 ac0000 ad0000 ae0000 af0000 b00000 b10000 b20000 b30000 b40000 b50000 b60000 b70000 b80000 b90000 ba0000 bb0000 bc0000 bd0000 be0000 bf0000 c00000 c10000 c20000 c30000 c40000 c50000 c60000 c70000 c80000 c90000 ca0000 cb0000 cc0000 cd0000 ce0000 cf0000 d00000 d10000 d20000 d30000 d40000 d50000 d60000 d70000 d80000 d90000 da0000 db0000 dc0000 dd0000 de0000 df0000 e00000 e10000 e20000 e30000 e40000 e50000 e60000 e70000 e80000 e90000 ea0000 eb0000 ec0000 ed0000 ee0000 ef0000 f00000 f10000 f20000 f30000 f40000 f50000 f60000 f70000 f80000 f90000 fa0000 fb0000 fc0000 fd0000 fe0000 ff0000

What fits your Files
